cookie.cookie_banner_text: We use cookies to make our service easier and faster for you to use, to personalize content for you, and to analyze website traffic. You can learn more about cookies or manage them individually by clicking 'Manage'. You can find more information and withdraw your consent at any time in our Privacy Policy.

spedBanner.title: Make Order with Sped
spedBanner.description: Craving something delicious? Get your favorite meals delivered fresh and fast. We partner with the best restaurants to satisfy your taste buds in no time.

newsLetter.title: Subscribe to our newsletter
newsLetter.description: Stay updated with the latest news, trends, and exclusive content. Subscribe now to never miss an update.
newsLetter.weeklyDescription: Get exclusive weekly insights delivered straight to your inbox.
newsLetter.noSpamDescription: We respect your privacy. No spam, just valuable content.

bookTable.title: Book a Table
bookTable.description: Book your table now and enjoy a great dining experience.
bookTable.name: Your Name

aboutUs.title: About Ravintola Sinet
aboutUs.description: Welcome to {name}, where flavor meets tradition. Located in the heart of our community, we offer a carefully crafted selection of dishes made with fresh, locally sourced ingredients.

features.authenticDescription: Our menu is inspired by traditional and modern flavors, designed to satisfy every palate.
features.freshDescription: We believe in fresh, organic, and locally sourced produce to serve the best on your plate.
features.loveDescription: Every dish we serve is prepared with care and passion by our dedicated chefs.
features.hospitalityDescription: Experience a welcoming atmosphere where every guest is treated like family.

aboutUs.closing: Join us at {name} — where every meal is a story, and every guest is family.

contactUs.heading: Contact Us
contactUs.description: We'd love to hear from you. Whether you have questions, feedback, or want to make a reservation — reach out to us!
